REUTERS.UNKNOWN: M f0929 reute d f BC-AMC-FEBRUARY-CAR-OUTP 03-03 0039

TEXT.TITLE: AMC FEBRUARY CAR OUTPUT DECLINES
TEXT.BODY: American Motors Corp said its February U.S. car production declined to 2,978 units from 3,808 a year ago. AMC said its U.S. jeep production rose to 18,651 from 16,673 last year. Reuter
